Coming Soon¶

I’m still finishing transfering Toyz from the old astropyp format. Some of the features that should be complete within the next week or two are workspaces, interactive Highcharts and Graph3d plots, and thorough documentation about how to incorporate your own scripts into a toyz application. Once that’s complete I will be pushing the distribution to PyPi so toyz can be installed via pip . Stay tuned.
